mapper.select: SELECT b.id id, b.building_name buildingName, b.total_households totalHouseholds, b.type type, b.description description, b.version version, date_format(b.gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d %T') gmtCreate, date_format(b.gmt_modified, '%Y-%m-%d %T') gmtModified FROM tb_building b ORDER BY b.id ASC LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}
